reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweatshirt comfortable, soft, and great for chilly early spring and fall, with many colors to choose from.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing. Comfy. High quality.
items.body: I usually expect that clothes off of Amazon will be subpar. I love everything about this hoodie. I’m 5’ 6”. I recently recovered from a year long hospital stay that has left my body bigger. I’m slowly replacing my wardrobe to adjust to these new curves. I don’t know how much I weigh, but I have some loose skin around my tummy and I don’t like when clothes are tight in that area. I wear anywhere from 1x to 3x and finding the right size is horrible. It makes sense for my size to be 2x based on my shape and weights. This fits exactly how I would expect a 3x sweater to fit and I ordered a 3x for that reason. The sleeves are perfect length (I usually end up with sleeves that are way too long and not the issue here.) The fit is both baggie where I want it to be and fitted where I want it to be. The material doesn’t feel plastic. It’s soft, warm and breathable (perfect for going in and out during these winter months). The hood has a functional tie. The kangaroo pocket is small enough on the sides that it holds your stuff in. The buttons are functional and look nice. I am blown away and wish I could 5 more. I live for hooded sweatshirts and have looked for a decade for this exact hoodie. Read more
items.author: Amber

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this hoodie
items.body: Love the color and fit. Soft but holds its structure well. Very comfortable. Recommend drying on fluff for a few minutes then lying flat to dry. Read more
items.author: Tami Gregg

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great buy for the money
items.body: This is a great buy for the price! Sweater fits nicely and wears well. Is quite warm. I bought the green first in a medium and it is a little big for the size but super warm. Then I bought one of the striped ones in a medium and it is a lot smaller than the green and lighter weight. Still a great sweater and I love both but differences in sizing and weight. Read more
items.author: Cathy Blankenship

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love my hoodie
items.author: bruhl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice medium weight sweater
items.body: Nice sweater.. not to heavy.. and not too long.. after washing it still had wrinkles but they ironed out.. Happy with purchase Read more
items.author: ljl

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars So comfy
items.body: This sweater is a big large for me but I still love it. It's a beautiful color and soft. Recently though it's been super staticky. I'm trying to find a way to rid it off static without using any chemicals or sprays. Read more
items.author: Jade

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm and beautiful
items.body: I love this sweater! The color is stunning, it is soft and warm. The thickness surprised me. It is nice and thick, especially for an Amazon sweater. The fit is true to size. I recommend to size up if you are looking for a baggier fit. Read more
items.author: Belladaball

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater
items.body: Fit well, material was soft and inviting, comfortable. I would buy again! Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Xmas2 Gray, B Khaki, Xmas3 Red, D Apricotstripe, B Gray, Y Black Skull, A Green, C Greenstripe, Y Black Hand, B Black, B Hazepowder, B Caramel, B Apricot, Xmas4 Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
